entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -26.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 01:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -26.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -30.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times late this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
